configs.name: POST_MODE
configs.doc: The POST mode of the clickstreamcloud. Must be a & value of the following properties: POST_MODE_P...

configs.name: POST_MODE_DATAUPDATE
configs.doc: Data update mode constant: POST if one session store data is updated.

configs.name: POST_MODE_PAGELOAD
configs.doc: Page load mode constant: POST on every page load.

configs.name: POST_MODE_TIMER
configs.doc: Timer mode constant: POST defined by an time interval.

configs.name: POST_PATH
configs.doc: Beginning of the path used by post.

configs.name: POST_PROCESS_TIMER
configs.doc: Interval in seconds to check if POST is needed in POST_MODE_TIMER mode (defaults to 60s).

configs.name: POST_TIMER
configs.doc: Interval in seconds to POST in POST_MODE_TIMER mode (defaults to 600s).

methods.name: post
methods.doc: Posts the current clientcontext object to the server (occurs only if posting is started).
